mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BNO, BWRITER, BTITLE, BCONTENTS, BHITS, BDATE, BFILENAME, BSTATE) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(BNO), 0) + 1 AS BNO FROM BOARD), #{bwriter}, #{btitle}, #{bcontents}, #{bhits}, DEFAULT, #{bfilename,jdbcType=NULL}, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BSTATE NOT IN('D') ORDER BY BNO DESC
